title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\Inventory\OsInfo
name: OsInfo
description:
Operating system information for the VM.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.Inventory.OsInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.long_name
params.description: The operating system long name. For example 'Debian GNU/Linux 9' or 'Microsoft Window Server 2019 Datacenter'.

params.name: data.short_name
params.description: The operating system short name. For example, 'windows' or 'debian'.

params.name: data.architecture
params.description: The system architecture of the operating system.

params.name: data.kernel_version
params.description: The kernel version of the operating system.

params.name: data.kernel_release
params.description: The kernel release of the operating system.

params.name: data.osconfig_agent_version
params.description: The current version of the OS Config agent running on the VM.
